DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , randomize , double-blind , parallel-group trial . After 2-week run-in period , eligible patient , base randomization code keep sealed envelope , randomly assign two groups.On basis usual care [ ambroxool ( 30mg thrice daily ) , N-acetylcysteine ( 0.2g thrice daily ) / serrapeptase ( 10mg thrice daily ) , carbocisteine ( 500mg thrice daily ) and/or chest physiotherapy ( 10 min , twice daily ) ] , patient randomize receive either hydrogen ( 66.7 % , 3L/min , 1 hr twice daily ) inhalation oxygen inhalation ( 3L/min , 1 hr twice daily ) via nasal canula 12 month . A follow-up visit month 3 follow end-of-treatment also schedule . The primary endpoint annual frequency bronchiectasis exacerbation .
